title: Video: Grandfather Birds – Higher Bridges
content: Those of you from the North East will be all to familiar with the infamous bridges that cross the River Tyne, so to set about recording a single which incorporates the usage of several of these crossings is a quirky and inspired idea. Grandfather Birds have done just that, recording under/on top of no fewer than five different bridges, thus bringing about the aptly titled Higher Bridges. The track itself is an epic indie number; showcasing why it’s a standout track from their live sets. A memorable riff, accompanied by a heartfelt, engaging chorus, allow the track to perfectly mirror the video. A black and white performance film, displaying Grand Father Birds in session, playing Higher Bridges, set to a projected background of flashing images and short clips of their beloved hometown Newcastle. Check out the video below, and head over to their bandcamp to purchase Higher Bridges.
